title: How to install & use QEMU+KVM and virt-manager

media:group.media:title: How to install & use QEMU+KVM and virt-manager
media:group.media:description:
In this video I'll cover installing QEMU and virt-manager and setting your first virtual machine.  In my opinion, the performance you get out of QEMU with KVM is much better than alternatives such as VirtualBox and VMWare. And unlike the others, QEMU is open source!

If you like my videos and/or find them useful, consider donating to my channel! https://www.patreon.com/doriandotslash

Commands using various package managers;

DEBIAN/MINT/UBUNTU using apt (apt-get)
  sudo apt install virt-manager
ARCH/MANJARO using pacman
 sudo pacman -S virt-manager
FEDORA using dnf
 sudo dnf install virt-manager
OPENSUSE using zypper
sudo zypper install virt-manager

Time Stamps;

00:49 Installing
